header.name: Ishita Sadaria
header.bio: Web developer with 2.3 years of experience specializing in Angular, HTML, CSS, TypeScript, JavaScript, React and GenAI. Proficient in delivering efficient, high-quality solutions with a focus on modularity and scalability. Known for performance excellence and innovation, with  a commitment to creating impactful user experiences.

projects.name: Citizens Bank - CLAAS Project
responsibilities: Designed, developed, and debugged a banking portal within an agile env, ensuring an engagging and user-friendly web application.
Collaborated closely with the clients to transform design mockups into functional web compoents and managing code via bitbucket.
Ensured code quality and addressed complexities and security issues using SonarQube and Jenkins

projects.name: Citizens Bank - OneClick-API Project
responsibilities: Built and optimized a user-friendly web application within an agile environment, focusing on seamless user engagement and functionality.
Ensured robust code quality by addressing complexities and security vulnerabilities through SonarQube and Jenkins.
Partnered with clients to translate design mockups into fully functional web components, utilizing Bitbucket for streamlined code management.

projects.name: Stack Overflow Clone
projects.desc: Developed a Stack Overflow clone enabling users to post questions and receive answers or feedback from the community. The project fosters knowledge sharing and collaboration by replicating a familiar Q&A platform.
